meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jeannie Blanke Justin Kowal Susan Jann Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6503.

td.p: Jeannie Blanke, an insurance office manager from Newbury Park, California
Justin Kowal, a financial manager from Glen Burnie, Maryland
Susan Jann, an operations coordinator from Bristol, Pennsylvania (whose 2-day cash winnings total $42,400)

tr.td: MYTHING IN ACTION
(Alex: We're not lisping.)
GOVERNORS
ALL OVER THE WORLD
MR. OR MS. RODRIGUEZ
LEGAL TERMS
WORDPLAY RANDOM SAMPLER

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'It\'s where the goddess Persephone spends a third of the year away from home')
